Name: The Book of Fredley
About the game: A Dark tale with a retro aesthetic , The Book of Fredley is torn and it's pages scattered throughout the isolated town of HumberBumton. Fredley is a bottomless pit of a child. To bring his friend back from the dead, Fredley must collect the pages, reform the book, and harvest souls along the way. Avoid and hide from enemies until you gain power, and tend to your innocent crops before harvest!
